newsitem.title: USA: Harbinger files to register 2.9 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Harbinger files to register 2.9 mln shrs.

text.p: Harbinger Corp filed Monday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to register an offering of up to 2.9 million common shares, of which the company will sell 1.8 million shares and a group of shareholders will sell 1.1 million shares.
Underwriters for the offering, Alex Brown & Sons Inc, Robinson-Humphrey Co Inc, Robertson Stephens & Co and Interstate Johnson Lane, have an over-allotment option of up to 435,000 shares.
After the offering, the Atlanta-based company said it will have 21,092,886 shares outstanding.
Harbinger said it will use the proceeds from the sale for general corporate purposes, which may include acquisitions.
